Articles.Content:
Hi i want to share with you the community about all my KSP missions that I'm going to do during 0.17

Mods I'm using:

Kathane pack

SAT pack

Payload pack

Carts

ISA Map sat

All the launch is going to be made with stock parts

Also if the launch is important i may record it

Well after all of that said here is my mission plan

October 1st:

Small probe to scout kerbin and the Mun

(then ask to let them scan)

October 2nd:

Small landers to start the mining on the Mun and Kerbin

October 3rd:

Probe to minmus

October 4th:

Send rovers to Mun miner and Kerbin miner

October 5th:

Send large Miner to minmus (a rover with miner combined)

From there i don't how what else to do and I'm open for suggestions
